actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1501, title 21, United States Code, to eliminate the position of Deputy Director of Demand Reduction within the Office of National Drug Control Policy.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to eliminate the position of Deputy Director for Demand Reduction within the Office of National Drug Control Policy.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1501, title 21, United States Code, to eliminate the position of Deputy Director of Demand Reduction within the Office of National Drug Control Policy.
